{{for||Tag}}
{{Infobox command
| name = tag
| oplevel = 
* 2 {{only|java|short=1}}
* 1 {{only|bedrock|short=1}}
| others = [[Cheat]] only{{only|bedrock|short=1}}
}}

Controls [[scoreboard tag]]s on individual [[entities]]. {{IN|java}}, the number of tags owned by an entity cannot exceed 1024.

{{el|je}} note: This is distinct from [[tags|entity type tags]], which are applied to [[Entity#Types of entities|entity types]] and can't be changed by commands.

== Syntax ==
* '''Java Edition'''
: <code>tag <targets> add <name></code>
:: Adds a tag to the targets.
: <code>tag <targets> remove <name></code>
:: Removes a tag from the targets.
: <code>tag <targets> list</code>
:: Lists all tags on the targets.

* '''Bedrock Edition'''
: <code>tag <entity: targets> add <name: string></code>
:: Adds a tag to the targets.
: <code>tag <entity: targets> remove <name: string></code>
:: Removes a tag from the targets.
: <code>tag <entity: targets> list</code>
:: Lists all tags on the targets.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|targets|entity|entity: target|WildcardCommandSelector<Actor>}}
: Specifies the command's target.
: {{IN|java}}, {{lcfirst:{{arg desc|je=entity|amount=multiple|type=entities}}}}
: {{IN|bedrock}}, must be either a [[Commands#Target_selectors|target selector]], a player name, or <code>*</code> for all score holders.

{{argument|name|string|name: string|basic_string}}
: Specifies the name of the tag to be added into or removed from the targets.
: {{arg desc|je=string|type=word|be=string}}
